summary: A collection of pytest test suites that verify the functionality, lifecycle management, and error handling of the Camera, IMU, and Servo hardware interfaces used in the system, covering both real and simulated implementations and ensuring correct state transitions and inter‑process communication.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and safety of critical hardware components—vision, inertial measurement, and airbrake actuation—by automatically testing their behavior under normal and adverse conditions before integration into the product.
